RangeIn.description: Distance from object before it spawns

RangeOut.description: Distance from object before it despawns

AppearRange.description: Range of the area where they will appear.

SearchRange.description: Range of the area where they will search for the player.

RangeAddX.description: Additional range on the X axis.

RangeAddY.description: Additional range on the Y axis.

RangeAddZ.description: Additional range on the Z axis.
